net.sourceforge.jaad.aac

Class SampleBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.jaad.aac.SampleBuffer

  • public class SampleBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The SampleBuffer holds the decoded AAC frame. It contains the raw PCM data and its format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SampleBuffer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBitrate()
      Returns the bitrate of the decoded PCM data.
      int getBitsPerSample()
      Returns the number of bits per sample.
      int getChannels()
      Returns the number of channels stored in the data buffer.
      byte[] getData()
      Returns the buffer's PCM data.
      double getEncodedBitrate()
      Returns the AAC bitrate of the current frame.
      double getLength()
      Returns the length of the current frame in seconds.

      Returns the data's sample rate.

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Returns the buffer's PCM data.
        Returns:
        the audio data

      • getSampleRate

        public int getSampleRate()
        Returns the data's sample rate.
        Returns:
        the sample rate

      • getChannels

        public int getChannels()
        Returns the number of channels stored in the data buffer.
        Returns:
        the number of channels

      • getBitsPerSample

        public int getBitsPerSample()
        Returns the number of bits per sample. Usually this is 16, meaning a sample is stored in two bytes.
        Returns:
        the number of bits per sample

      • getLength

        public double getLength()
        Returns the length of the current frame in seconds. length = samplesPerChannel / sampleRate
        Returns:
        the length in seconds

      • getBitrate

        public double getBitrate()
        Returns the bitrate of the decoded PCM data. bitrate = (samplesPerChannel * bitsPerSample) / length
        Returns:
        the bitrate

      • getEncodedBitrate

        public double getEncodedBitrate()
        Returns the AAC bitrate of the current frame.
        Returns:
        the AAC bitrate

      • isBigEndian

        public boolean isBigEndian()
        Indicates the endianness for the data.
        Returns:
        true if the data is in big endian, false if it is in little endian

      • setBigEndian

        public void setBigEndian(boolean bigEndian)
        Sets the endianness for the data.
        Parameters:
        bigEndian - if true the data will be in big endian, else in little endian

      • setData

        public void setData(byte[] data,
           int sampleRate,
           int channels,
           int bitsPerSample,
           int bitsRead)
